canadian_clinical.starting_dose: 250mg TID or 500mg BID (or 20mg/kg loading for acute mania)
canadian_clinical.titration_schedule: Increase by 250-500mg every 3 days based on tolerability using monitoring levels.
canadian_clinical.inpatient_strategy: Rapid loading: 20-30mg/kg/day can be used to reach therapeutic levels within 24 hours.
canadian_clinical.outpatient_strategy: Start 250mg TID, increase by 250-500mg weekly to minimize GI side effects.
canadian_clinical.max_dose_practice: Often capped around 2500-3000mg/day depending on levels/side effects.

cautions.hepatic: Contraindicated in severe hepatic impairment. Monitor LFTs.
cautions.pregnancy: Teratogenic (Neural Tube Defects). Avoid if possible in women of childbearing potential.
